hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT {receiver.*} FROM RECEIVERS receiver LEFT OUTER JOIN SERVICE_PROVIDERS provider ON receiver.SERVICE_PROVIDER_KEY = provider.EXTERNAL_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PAYMENT_SERVICES service ON provider.SERVICE_ID = service.ID WHERE (receiver.LOGIN_ID = :loginId) AND (receiver.KIND IN ('J', 'P', 'B')) AND ((:extra_name IS NULL) OR (:extra_name = '') OR (upper(receiver.RECEIVER_NAME) LIKE '%' || :extra_name || '%')) AND ((:extra_INN IS NULL) OR (:extra_INN = '') OR (receiver.RECEIVER_INN LIKE '%' || :extra_INN || '%')) AND ((:extra_paymentService IS NULL) OR (:extra_paymentService = '') OR (upper(service.NAME) LIKE '%' || :extra_paymentService || '%'))
